thread.title: Elderly driver in Wales takes a corner on two wheels and lands it like a pro
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Elderly driver in Wales takes a corner on two wheels and lands it like a pro - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Elderly driver in Wales takes a corner on two wheels and lands it like a pro
text:
Someone's clearly a fan of M.I.A .
An elderly woman in Wales made this staggering driving move in a petrol station yesterday and was thankfully unharmed after accidentally (at least we hope it was accidentally) taking a corner out of the station on two wheels.
According to the uploader Sian Jones, the woman in her early 80s was trying to do a quick turn around to be on the right side of the forecourt for petrol when she took the corner too fast but 'wasn't fazed at all' by what happened.
Since the video was uploaded yesterday it's been seen over 100,000 times. "The old woman was fine, that's the reason I shared it" Jones said in another comment on Facebook, just in case you were wondering.
 Theres drivers and drivers, fair play good recovery from this old lady!
Posted by Sian Jones on Monday, October 19, 2015 Via Facebook
